services.heading: Information support:
services.content: Information consultations are provided to Ukrainian citizens regarding their stay, adaptation and integration in Estonia free of charge by phone, e-mail and on-site (by prior arrangement)

services.heading: Psychological support and group therapy:
services.content: Psychological assistance to children, adolescents and adults who have psychological problems, problems with adaptation at the workplace, school, kindergarten, have difficulties at home, experience sadness, anxiety, insomnia
